amendment.description: An amendment numbered 49 printed in House Report 115-259 to redirect $1 million in funding within the Departmental Administration account in order to address environmental concerns in both urban and rural settings.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jackson Lee amendment (A029) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment (A029) offered by Ms. Jackson Lee.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Jackson Lee amendment (A029) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A029) offered by Ms. Jackson Lee.
